overview: Assaf is the VP of Project Management at Kaltura, the fastest growing online video platform in the market. Overseeing professional services activities, Assaf ensures professional execution of onboarding and development projects for Kaltura’s many customers. Having joined Kaltura in early 2008, Assaf led the execution of some of the company’s largest, most technologically innovative projects and helped build the project management and sales engineering teams. Coming from a background of technology and graphic design, Assaf served as an operations officer and field commander in the Israeli Air Force before joining Kaltura. He lives with his wife Michal in San Francisco, enjoying the local music, art and culture.
